attributes.action: REMOVE ALL ASBESTOS FOR NATIONAL SECURITY REASONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE CHANCES OF A TERRORIST GROUP GETTING HOLD OF ASBESTOS ROOFING AND GRINDING DOWN TO A FINE POWDER IS HIGH.THIS POWDER COULD THEN BE SPREAD IN PUBLIC PLACES IE USED FOR A TERRORIST ATTACK THIS IS INEVITABLE

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
